info.title: TeamView Metrics API
info.description: API To Interact with TeamView Application to Add Metrics Data.

rcamaturity.description: Indicates maturity of RCA best practices,adoption and implementation by a product team

automated_test_Cases.description: Actual number of test cases that are automated

defectfixing.description: Measures the efforts  spent on fixing defects reported by customers

criticalDefects.description: Measures number of defects reported by customer for a given product

small_enhancements.description: Count of enhancements that sized <= 20 story points. Or Count of enhancements that consumed <= 25 Persondays effort.

productName.description: Product Name for which Metrics to be added

lowDefects.description: Measures number of defects reported by customer for a given product

numberOfTestCases.description: Total count of test cases defined for UI, Functional, API and Unit testing

number_of_releases.description: Measures number of releases by a product development team on Release Branch in a given month

cimaturity.description: Indicates maturity of CI best practices,adoption and implementation by a product team

large_enhancements.description: Count of enhancements that sized > 50 story points. Or Count of enhancements that consumed > 60 Persondays effort.

story_Points_completed.description: Actual story points delivered at the end of sprint by a Scrum team OR Actual Velocity

medium_enhancements.description: Count of enhancements that sized > 20 and <= 50 story points. Or Count of enhancements that consumed <= 60 Persondays effort.

estimated_missing_cases.description: Estimated number of test cases for scenarios  such as new functionality, change requests, defects, missed coverage in the existing functionality, etc

mediumDefects.description: Measures number of defects reported by customer for a given product

lines_of_code_automated_unit_Testing.description: Count of lines of source code executed during automated unit testing

iterativeMaturity.description: Indicates maturity of CI best practices,adoption and implementation by a product team

lines_of_code_automated_Testing.description: Count of lines of source code executed during automated testing

total_lines_code.description: Count of executable lines of source code in a product

highDefects.description: Measures number of defects reported by customer for a given product

story_Points_Planned.description: Planned story points for a  sprint by a Scrum team OR Planned Velocity
